div.p: The current release of MEI (2010-05) is available for download from sourceforge.net. You may download different files from there:

div.div: The complete release of MEI 2010-05, which includes all of the following files.
A PDF version of the MEI Tag Library, release 2010-05

div.p: The schema is provided by Sourceforge in a GNU tarball (.tar.gz) container format; if you prefer to download all files individually or have any problems using the tarball, you can access the files directly at Sourceforge.

Furthermore, some XSL stylesheets for generating and processing MEI are provided on Sourceforge. These files are mostly for testing purposes, you may have to edit the output of these in order to get satisfying results.

div.div: Allows to transform MusicXML (timewise) into MEI
Converts an unambiguous MEI into a MUP input file

div.p: In order to use the musicxml2mei stylesheet properly, you might have to transform your MusicXML file from "partwise" to "timewise" structure using parttime.xsl from the MusicXML website.
